page.title: 05HOUSING IN HEDON
page.content: {Population changes.}The population of Hedon has changed a lot over the past 35 years.In 1950 it was just under 2000,in 1975 it was 3500 and in 1985 it is now over 5000 this has caused an increase in the number of houses in Hedon. There are 3 main housing areas of Hedon.The {old town centre}consists mainly of terraced housing.There is a Hedon Town Preservation Scheme operating in this area.To the west of the old town is the council housing estate called{Westlands.}350 houses are built on this site,over 100 houses have been purchased by the tenants. To the east of the town centre is the{ {Inmans Road/Brevere Road} new private housing estate.More and more new houses are being built on this estate. { }
